dmca.title: Notification of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Spoof News Editor [mailto:editor@spoofnews.com] 
Sent: Friday, July 01, 2005 10:47 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notification of Claimed Infringement

Please process this Notification of Claimed Infringement. Whois lists The
Planet as the host. Per your policy, the following information is
provided:

Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed:

http://www.spoofnews.com/content/view/313/31/

Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing:

http://www.webnewswire.com/article437350.html

http://www.presstrust.com/article437350.html

Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to contact
the Complaining Party:

John Burgund
P.O. Box 14763
Tucson, AZ 85732
520-548-9376
editor@spoofnews.com

Each page on this site contains a copyright notice and links to the
copyright policy at the top and bottom of the page. Users are always one or
two clicks from a form they can use to request permission. The poster of
this article is in violation of my site's policies:

http://www.spoofnews.com/content/view/274/33/

I believe the copyright notice is clearly posted, the copyright policy is
explicit and asking for permission is practical.

Please disable the content in question.

In accordance with the Digital Millenium Copyright Act:

"I do affirm that in good faith, I believe this material is not authorized
for use."

"I hereby state, under penalty of perjury in a United States court, that the
material given here is accurate and I am authorized to act on behalf of the
copyright holder."

Please let me know when this action has been accomplished. Thank you.

John Burgund
